title: Jean's fugue
creator_credit: Michael Reeves, Derek Wright and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: Shows the activities at a Summer Music School at Cambridge. The intensive work and casual fun make the fortnight at Cambridge University benefit both the individual musician and the music world.
